attractions.name: Unity Park
attractions.description: Historic palace complex turned museum showcasing Ethiopian history and culture. Features beautiful gardens and architecture.
tips: Plan for at least 3 hours to explore

attractions.name: National Museum of Ethiopia
attractions.description: Home to archaeological and historical artifacts, including Lucy, the famous early hominid fossil.

attractions.name: Holy Trinity Cathedral
attractions.description: Beautiful church and architectural landmark. Final resting place of Emperor Haile Selassie.

attractions.name: Entoto Park
attractions.description: Mountain park with panoramic city views. Features adventure activities and restaurants.

attractions.name: Merkato
attractions.description: Africa's largest open-air market. A bustling hub of commerce and culture.

attractions.name: Red Terror Martyrs Museum
attractions.description: Memorial museum documenting a crucial period in Ethiopian history.

attractions.name: Mount Entoto
attractions.description: Historic mountain offering panoramic views and home to ancient churches.

attractions.name: Ethnological Museum
attractions.description: Located in Haile Selassie's former palace, showcasing Ethiopian cultural heritage.

attractions.name: St. George Cathedral
attractions.description: Octagonal church known for its beautiful architecture and historical significance.

attractions.name: Africa Hall
attractions.description: Historic building and headquarters of the United Nations Economic Commission for Africa.

attractions.name: Meskel Square
attractions.description: Major public square and gathering place for cultural celebrations.

attractions.name: Lion of Judah Monument
attractions.description: Historic statue symbolizing Ethiopian monarchy and independence.

attractions.name: Addis Ababa Museum
attractions.description: City museum showcasing the history and development of Addis Ababa.

attractions.name: Zoma Museum
attractions.description: Contemporary art museum with traditional architecture and ecological focus.

attractions.name: Sheger Park
attractions.description: Modern riverside park with walking trails and recreational facilities.

Bole.description: Modern business district with shopping centers, hotels, and restaurants. Home to Bole International Airport.
Bole.main_areas: Bole Road, Bole Medhanialem, Bole Atlas

Kirkos.description: Central district with government offices, cultural venues, and business centers.

Arada.description: Historic district with traditional markets and cultural heritage.

Yeka.description: Residential area with growing business centers and universities.

Addis Ketema.description: Home to Africa's largest open-air market and major transport hub.

public_transport.description: Modern transit system connecting major areas
routes: North-South Line: Menelik II Square to Kaliti

public_transport.description: Extensive bus network throughout the city
tips: Can be crowded during peak hours

taxis.description: Traditional shared taxis following fixed routes

general_safety: Keep valuables secure and out of sight
Use registered taxis or ride-hailing apps at night
Stay aware of your surroundings in crowded areas
health_safety: Use reputable restaurants and food establishments
